data: `minecraft:knockback_resistance` sets the knockback resistance item component. Determines the amount of  knockback resistance that the item has.
`minecraft:knockback_resistance` requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)

data.Name: protection
data.Description: Amount of knockback resistance provided with the total maximum protection being 1.0
